body: Wasn't our convention so far to forbid having nullptr types and use `Dynamic` instead (we should probably reconsider that and start using `Unknown`, but now having `nullptrs` seems like a good thing to me)
body_html: Wasn't our convention so far to forbid having nullptr types and use Dynamic instead (we should probably reconsider that and start using Unknown, but now having nullptrs seems like a good thing to me)
